BAERCOIL


## M3 X 0.5 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**€41.29** ~~~~

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit M 3 x 0.5

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in M 3 x 0.5.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 3 |
| Pitch | 0,5 |
| Dimension | M 3 x 0,5 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 4,5 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 3 mm=4.5 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 3 is 3 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 3 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 4,5 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 3,60 mm - 4,35 mm |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 6,25 mm |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 6,75 mm |

### Content

- 1 x 16132: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 3.20 mm
- 1 x B3005-1: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap M 3 x 0.5 EG
- 1 x EBW03: BaerCoil installation tool M 3 x 0,5 \|
- 1 x BZ003: BaerCoil Tang breaker M 3 x 0,5
- 20 x B7205-15: BaerCoil thread inserts M 3 x 0.5 - length: 1.5 D - type: "free running" - material: A2 (1.4301) - tolerance ISO 2 (6H)

Style

- BAERCOIL M3 X 0.45 KIT

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

Product information

BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit M 30 x 2.0

With this BaerCoil® thread repair-set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in MF 30 x 2.0.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair set contains various auxiliary tools, such as the hand tap with oversize for insert threads, insertion tool and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

This set does not include twist drill bit and tang breaker. To drill the core hole, a 30.5 mm twist drill bit is still needed here. The tenon can be broken with the installation tool. To do this, pull the installation tool back after installation and turn it 90° so that it rests on the tenon. Then strike the tool briefly at the back.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

Dimensions

Diameter    30

Pitch    2,0

Dimension    MF 30 x 2,0

Length    1,5 D

T (Length when installed)    45 mm

Thread length calculation    1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 30 mm=45 mm

The nominal diameter for MF 30 is 30 mm

Characteristics

Product group    Wire thread inserts - Repair kits

Product type    BaerCoil thread repair kits

Thread standard    MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13

Tolerance    ISO2/6H

Direction    Right

Type    free running

Tensile strength at room temperature    >1400 N/mm²

Material    Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301)

Temperature resistance    315°C long-term

425°C short-term

Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

Technical drawing

Diameter    30

Length    1,5 D

T (Length when installed)    45 mm

P (depth)    The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface

Content

1 x B3055: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap M 30 x 2.0 EG

1 x EBW30: BaerCoil Installation tool M 30 x 2.0

5 x B7355-15: BaerCoil thread inserts M 30 x 2.0 - length: 1.5 D - type: "free running" - material: A2 (1.4301) - tolerance ISO 2 (6H)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit M 33 x 2.0

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in MF 33 x 2.0.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair set contains various auxiliary tools, such as the hand tap with oversize for insert threads, insertion tool and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

This set does not include twist drill bit and tang breaker. To drill the core hole, a 33.5 mm twist drill bit is still needed here. The tenon can be broken with the installation tool. To do this, pull the installation tool back after installation and turn it 90° so that it rests on the tenon. Then strike the tool briefly at the back.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 33 |
| Pitch | 2,0 |
| Dimension | MF 33 x 2,0 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 49,5 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 33 mm=49.5 mm<br>The nominal diameter for MF 33 is 33 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | MF: Metric ISO fine thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 33 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 49,5 mm |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |

### Content

- 1 x B3058: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap M 33 x 2.0 EG
- 1 x EBW33: BaerCoil Installation tool M 33 x 2.0
- 5 x B7358-15: BaerCoil thread inserts M 33 x 2.0 - length: 1.5 D - type: "free running" - material: A2 (1.4301) - tolerance ISO 2 (6H)

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M33 x 2 BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit

**€726.04** ~~~~

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit M 33 x 2.0

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in MF 33 x 2.0.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair set contains various auxiliary tools, such as the hand tap with oversize for insert threads, insertion tool and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

This set does not include twist drill bit and tang breaker. To drill the core hole, a 33.5 mm twist drill bit is still needed here. The tenon can be broken with the installation tool. To do this, pull the installation tool back after installation and turn it 90° so that it rests on the tenon. Then strike the tool briefly at the back.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

| Pitch | 2,0 |

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap > ISO1-4H

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## M39 X 2.0 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**€1,072.99** ~~~~

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap > ISO1-4H

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/free_shipping_icon_medium.png?1283)

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m39-x-2-0-baercoil-kit-helicoil?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap > ISO1-4H

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/free_shipping_icon_medium.png?1283)

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

Product information

## BaerFix Thread Repair Kit M 3 x 0.5 - ECO

* * *

With the BaerFix® thread repair set, damaged M 3 threads can be repaired quickly and easily.

This set contains all the tools you need to achieve a permanent and strong anchorage in various materials. The BaerFix® thread repair set is ideal for materials such as aluminium, light metals, non-ferrous metals, brass, bronze, cast iron, plastics, laminates and hardwood. Please note that the set is only suitable for materials with a tensile strength up to approx. 450 N/mm².

BaerFix® thread inserts are self-tapping, guarantee a permanently tight threaded connection in your workpiece and are extremely easy to use. Simply screw into the hole - the inserts cut the holding thread themselves. Once your thread is worn or torn out, a stable connection between the materials is no longer possible. This is where BaerFix® thread insert comes to the rescue. With our self-tapping thread inserts you can repair or strengthen damaged internal thread. Damaged threads in your components do not have to be rejects. Simply insert a threaded insert with the same internal thread into the component and your thread will not only be repaired, it will also be more pull-out resistant and wear resistant. The pull-out strength is higher than a class 8.8 screw.

To assist with the repair, the set includes a core drill bit and an assembly tool in addition to the thread inserts. Use the core drill bit to prepare the core hole and the installation tool to insert the self-tapping thread insert.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 3 |
| Pitch | 0,5 |
| Dimension | M 3 x 0,5 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Self-cutting thread inserts - Thread repair kits |
| Speed guide value for light metals | 650-900 R/min |
| Product type | BaerFix thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | with cutting slots |
| Material | Case-hardened steel, galvanized |

### Guidelines for material machining

| Maximum insertion torque | 2,5 Nm |
| Speed guide value for light metals | 650-900 R/min |
| Drilling depth | Min. drilling depth for through hole: 6.00 mm<br>Min. drilling depth for blind hole: 8.00 mm |
| Pre-drilling diameter | **Light metal alloys (tensile strength 250 - 300 N/mm²):** 4.6 mm<br>**Light metal alloys (tensile strength 300 - 350 N/mm²):** 4.7 mm<br>**Light metal alloys (tensile strength over 350 N/mm²):** 4.8 mm<br>**Brass, non-ferrous metals, bronze (tensile strength above 350 N/mm²):** 4.7 - 4.8 mm<br>Cast iron (Brinel **hardness below 150 HB)**: 4.6 mm<br>Cast iron **(Brinel hardness 150 - 200 HB):** 4.7 mm<br>Cast iron **(Brinel hardness above 200 HB** ): 4.8 mm |

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerFix thread insert with cutting slots](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/2e/e9/e7/BaerFix_Schlitz.svg)

| D1 | M 3 x 0,5 |
| D2 | M 5 x 0,5 |
| L1 | 6 mm |
| Diameter | 3 |

### Content

- 1 x 1-16147: BaerFix HSS twist drill bit 4.70 mm
- 1 x 1-KEBW03: BaerFix Installation tool M 3
- 1 x B9501: BaerFix adapter nut
- 5 x FE03: BaerFix self-tapping thread inserts with cutting slots M 3 x 0.5 - length: 6 mm - material: case-hardened steel, galvanised

### Minimum wall thickness

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c9/g0/bd/Zeichnung_Restwandstaerke.svg)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## BaerFix Thread Repair Kit M 3 x 0.5 - ECO

* * *

With the BaerFix® thread repair set, damaged M 3 threads can be repaired quickly and easily.

This set contains all the tools you need to achieve a permanent and strong anchorage in various materials. The BaerFix® thread repair set is ideal for materials such as aluminium, light metals, non-ferrous metals, brass, bronze, cast iron, plastics, laminates and hardwood. Please note that the set is only suitable for materials with a tensile strength up to approx. 450 N/mm².

BaerFix® thread inserts are self-tapping, guarantee a permanently tight threaded connection in your workpiece and are extremely easy to use. Simply screw into the hole - the inserts cut the holding thread themselves. Once your thread is worn or torn out, a stable connection between the materials is no longer possible. This is where BaerFix® thread insert comes to the rescue. With our self-tapping thread inserts you can repair or strengthen damaged internal thread. Damaged threads in your components do not have to be rejects. Simply insert a threaded insert with the same internal thread into the component and your thread will not only be repaired, it will also be more pull-out resistant and wear resistant. The pull-out strength is higher than a class 8.8 screw.

To assist with the repair, the set includes a core drill bit and an assembly tool in addition to the thread inserts. Use the core drill bit to prepare the core hole and the installation tool to insert the self-tapping thread insert.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 3 |
| Pitch | 0,5 |
| Dimension | M 3 x 0,5 |

| Speed guide value for light metals | 650-900 R/min |
| Product type | BaerFix thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | with cutting slots |
| Material | Case-hardened steel, galvanized |

| Speed guide value for light metals | 650-900 R/min |
| Drilling depth | Min. drilling depth for through hole: 6.00 mm<br>Min. drilling depth for blind hole: 8.00 mm |
| Pre-drilling diameter | **Light metal alloys (tensile strength 250 - 300 N/mm²):** 4.6 mm<br>**Light metal alloys (tensile strength 300 - 350 N/mm²):** 4.7 mm<br>**Light metal alloys (tensile strength over 350 N/mm²):** 4.8 mm<br>**Brass, non-ferrous metals, bronze (tensile strength above 350 N/mm²):** 4.7 - 4.8 mm<br>Cast iron (Brinel **hardness below 150 HB)**: 4.6 mm<br>Cast iron **(Brinel hardness 150 - 200 HB):** 4.7 mm<br>Cast iron **(Brinel hardness above 200 HB** ): 4.8 mm |

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit M 4 x 0.7

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair-set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in M 4 x 0.7.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 4 |
| Pitch | 0,7 |
| Dimension | M 4 x 0,7 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 4 mm=6 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 4 is 4 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 4 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 4,83 mm - 5,60 mm |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 8,45 mm |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 9,15 mm |

### Content

- 1 x 16142: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 4.20 mm
- 1 x B3007-1: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap M 4 x 0.7 EG
- 1 x EBW04: BaerCoil Installation tool M 4 x 0.7
- 1 x BZ004: BaerCoil Tang breaker M 4 x 0,7
- 20 x B7207-15: BaerCoil thread inserts M 4 x 0.7 - length: 1.5 D - type: "free running" - material: A2 (1.4301) - tolerance ISO 2 (6H)

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay

View details

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## M4 x 0.7 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**€41.29** ~~~~

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit M 4 x 0.7

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair-set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in M 4 x 0.7.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 4 |
| Pitch | 0,7 |
| Dimension | M 4 x 0,7 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 4 mm=6 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 4 is 4 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 4 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 4,83 mm - 5,60 mm |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 8,45 mm |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 9,15 mm |

### Content

- 1 x 16142: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 4.20 mm
- 1 x B3007-1: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap M 4 x 0.7 EG
- 1 x EBW04: BaerCoil Installation tool M 4 x 0.7
- 1 x BZ004: BaerCoil Tang breaker M 4 x 0,7
- 20 x B7207-15: BaerCoil thread inserts M 4 x 0.7 - length: 1.5 D - type: "free running" - material: A2 (1.4301) - tolerance ISO 2 (6H)

Style

- BAERCOIL M4 X 0.7 KIT

[View product](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m4-x-0-7-baercoil-kit-helicoil?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap > ISO1-4H

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/baer_coil_kit_3238813.jpg?v=1345289536&width=88)

M42 X 3.0 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)


**€1,227.99** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m42-x-3-0-baercoil-kit-helicoil?currency=EUR#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap > ISO1-4H

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M42 X 3.0 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**€1,227.99** ~~~~

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap > ISO1-4H

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap > ISO1-4H

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

**€1,227.99** ~~~~

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap > ISO1-4H

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

normally is stronger than the original one.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Content:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap > ISO1-4H

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

M5 - M12 BaerCoil Workshop Kits (Helicoil Type) B5104

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m5-m12baercoilworkshopkitshelicoiltypeb5104?currency=EUR#product-info)

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 5 - M 12

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in M 5 - 12.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair magazine contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand taps with oversize for insert threads, insertion tools, tang breakers and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened if necessary, according to the required length, with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 5 - 12 |
| Dimension | M 5 - 12 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair workshop kits |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Content

| Machine- screw tap | Machine installation tool | Tang breakers | core drill bit | Taper countersink | thread inserts Length: 1,5 x D | thread inserts Length: 2,5 x D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 5 x 0.8 | EBW05 | BZ005 | 5.2 mm | 10.4 mm | 10 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10.4 mm | 10 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10.4 mm | 10 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 10 x 1.5 | EBW10 | BZ010 | 10.4 mm | 16.5 mm | 5 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 12 x 1.75 | EBW12 | BZ012 | 12.4 mm | 16.5 mm | 5 pcs. | 5 pcs. |

BAERCOIL


## M5 - M12 BaerCoil Workshop Kits (Helicoil Type) B5104

**€227.54** ~~~~

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 5 - M 12

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in M 5 - 12.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair magazine contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand taps with oversize for insert threads, insertion tools, tang breakers and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened if necessary, according to the required length, with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 5 - 12 |
| Dimension | M 5 - 12 |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair workshop kits |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Content

| Machine- screw tap | Machine installation tool | Tang breakers | core drill bit | Taper countersink | thread inserts Length: 1,5 x D | thread inserts Length: 2,5 x D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 5 x 0.8 | EBW05 | BZ005 | 5.2 mm | 10.4 mm | 10 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10.4 mm | 10 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10.4 mm | 10 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 10 x 1.5 | EBW10 | BZ010 | 10.4 mm | 16.5 mm | 5 pcs. | 5 pcs. |
| M 12 x 1.75 | EBW12 | BZ012 | 12.4 mm | 16.5 mm | 5 pcs. | 5 pcs. |

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 5 - M 8

in metal box

Box Content:

BaerCoil Drill HSS

STI Bottoming Tap HSSG

BaerCoil Inserting Tool

BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running" - lengths: **1.5 D - 2.5 D**

**different lengths for most applications**

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Tang Break Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts length: 1.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts length: 2.5 D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 5 x 0.8 | EBW05 | BZ005 | 5.2 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10 | 5 |

Lengths of the Wire Thread Inserts: 1.5 D and 2.5 D (D= Diameter) - stainless Steel

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## M5 - M8 BaerCoil Workshop Kit (Helicoil Type)

**€97.79** ~~~~

BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 5 - M 8

in metal box

Box Content:

BaerCoil Drill HSS

STI Bottoming Tap HSSG

BaerCoil Inserting Tool

BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running" - lengths: **1.5 D - 2.5 D**

**different lengths for most applications**

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Tang Break Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts length: 1.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts length: 2.5 D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 5 x 0.8 | EBW05 | BZ005 | 5.2 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10 | 5 |

Lengths of the Wire Thread Inserts: 1.5 D and 2.5 D (D= Diameter) - stainless Steel

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit M 5 x 0.8

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in M 5 x 0.8.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 5 |
| Pitch | 0,8 |
| Dimension | M 5 x 0,8 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 7,5 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 5 mm=7.5 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 5 is 5 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 5 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 7,5 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 5,94 mm - 6,80 mm |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 10,30 mm |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 11,10 mm |

### Content

- 1 x 16152: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 5.20 mm
- 1 x B3008-1: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap M 5 x 0.8 EG
- 1 x EBW05: BaerCoil installation tool M 5 x 0,8
- 1 x BZ005: BaerCoil Tang breaker M 5 x 0.8
- 20 x B7208-15: BaerCoil thread inserts M 5 x 0.8 - length: 1.5 D - type: "free running" - material: A2 (1.4301) - tolerance ISO 2 (6H)

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit M 5 x 0.8

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in M 5 x 0.8.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. ## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

M6 - M10 BaerCoil Workshop Kits (Helicoil Type)


**€110.09** ~~~~

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 6 - M 10

in metal box

Box Content:

BaerCoil Drill HSS

STI Bottoming Tap HSSG

BaerCoil Inserting Tool

BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running" - lengths: **1.5 D - 2.5 D**

**different lengths for most applications**

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Tang Break Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts length: 1.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts length: 2.5 D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 10 x 1.5 | EBW10 | BZ010 | 10.4 mm | 5 | 5 |

Lengths of the Wire Thread Inserts: 1.5 D and 2.5 D (D= Diameter) - stainless Steel

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M6 - M10 BaerCoil Workshop Kits (Helicoil Type)

**€110.09** ~~~~

BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 6 - M 10

in metal box

Box Content:

BaerCoil Drill HSS

STI Bottoming Tap HSSG

BaerCoil Inserting Tool

BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running" - lengths: **1.5 D - 2.5 D**

**different lengths for most applications**

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Tang Break Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts length: 1.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts length: 2.5 D |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10 | 5 |
| M 10 x 1.5 | EBW10 | BZ010 | 10.4 mm | 5 | 5 |

Lengths of the Wire Thread Inserts: 1.5 D and 2.5 D (D= Diameter) - stainless Steel

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

BaerCoil Thread Repair Workshop Kit M 6 - M 14 x 1.25\* (\*Spark Plug)

in metal box

Box Content:

BaerCoil Drill HSS

STI Bottoming Tap HSSG

BaerCoil Inserting Tool

BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ Wire Thread Inserts - type: "free running" - lengths: **1.5 D - 2.5 D**

**different lengths for most applications**

| BaerCoil Tap | Inserting Tool | Tang Break Tool | Drill | Wire Thread Inserts length: 1.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts length: 2.5 D | Wire Thread Inserts |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| M 6 x 1.0 | EBW06 | BZ006 | 6.3 mm | 10 | 5 | - |
| M 8 x 1.25 | EBW08 | BZ008 | 8.3 mm | 10 | 5 | - |
| M 10 x 1.5 | EBW10 | BZ010 | 10.4 mm | 5 | 5 | - |
| M 12 x 1.75 | EBW12 | BZ012 | 12.4 mm | 5 | 5 | - |
| M 14 x 1.25\* | EBW14 | - | - | 5 pcs. 8.4 mm | 5 pcs. 12.4 mm | 5 pcs. 16.4 mm |

\*Combined drilling and tapping tool for Spark Plug (no pre-drilling necessary).

Lengths of the Wire Thread Inserts: 1.5 D and 2.5 D (D= Diameter) - stainless Steel

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[Metric Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)
