## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## UNC 5 X 40 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**€33.21** ~~~~

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Contents:

1 x M3.4 BaerCoil Drill Bit

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 20 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 6 x 32

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC No. 6 x 32.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 6 |
| Pitch | 32 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 6 x 32 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 5,26 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 3.51 mm=5.26 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC No. 6 is approx. 3.51 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | No. 6 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 5,26 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,175 '' - 0,193 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,316 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,348 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16137: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 3.70 mm
- 1 x B3103: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 6 x 32 EG
- 1 x EBW03: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 6 x 32
- 1 x BZ003: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 6 x 32
- 20 x B8203-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC No. 6 x 32 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## UNC 6 x 32 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**€56.67** ~~~~

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 6 x 32

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC No. 6 x 32.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. | Pitch | 32 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 6 x 32 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 5,26 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 3.51 mm=5.26 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC No. 6 is approx. 3.51 mm |

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | No. 6 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 5,26 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,175 '' - 0,193 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |

| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,348 '' |

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 7/16 x 14

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in UNC 7/16 x 14.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 7/16 |
| Pitch | 14 |
| Dimension | UNC 7/16 x 14 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 16,67 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 11.11 mm=16.67 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 7/16 is approx. 11.11 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 7/16 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 16,67 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,520 '' - 0,551 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,906 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,978 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 161115: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 11.50 mm
- 1 x B3110: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 7/16 x 14 EG
- 1 x EBW10: BaerCoil installation tool UNC 7/16 x 14
- 1 x BZ010: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 7/16 x 14
- 10 x B8210-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 7/16 x 14 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## UNC 7/16 x 14 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**€74.80** ~~~~

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 7/16 x 14

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in UNC 7/16 x 14.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. ## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Contents:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

\+ 5 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), lenght: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive,

medical and aerospace industries.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 8 x 32

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC No. 8 x 32.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 8 |
| Pitch | 32 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 8 x 32 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6,25 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 4.17 mm=6.25 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC No. 8 is approx. 4.17 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | No. 8 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6,25 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,201 '' - 0,220 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,355 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,387 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16145: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 4.50 mm
- 1 x B3104: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 8 x 32 EG
- 1 x EBW04: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 8 x 32
- 1 x BZ004: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 8 x 32
- 20 x B8204-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC No. 8 x 32 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

### Payment & Security

- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay

- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

BAERCOIL


## UNC 8 x 32 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

**€56.92** ~~~~

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 8 x 32

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole and blind-hole threads in UNC No. 8 x 32.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 8 |
| Pitch | 32 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 8 x 32 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6,25 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 4.17 mm=6.25 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC No. 8 is approx. 4.17 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | No. 8 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 6,25 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,201 '' - 0,220 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,355 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,387 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16145: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 4.50 mm
- 1 x B3104: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 8 x 32 EG
- 1 x EBW04: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 8 x 32
- 1 x BZ004: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNC 8 x 32
- 20 x B8204-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC No. 8 x 32 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

Style

- UNC 8 X 32 X BAERCOIL KIT
- TRS 8 X 32 UNC KIT

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNC 9/16 x 12

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in UNC 9/16 x 12.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair set contains various auxiliary tools, such as the hand tap with oversize for insert threads, insertion tool and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

This set does not include twist drill bit and tang breaker. To drill the core hole, a 14.8 mm twist drill bit is still needed here. The tenon can be broken with the installation tool. To do this, pull the installation tool back after installation and turn it 90° so that it rests on the tenon. Then strike the tool briefly at the back.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 9/16 |
| Pitch | 12 |
| Dimension | UNC 9/16 x 12 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 21,43 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 14.29 mm=21.43 mm<br>The nominal diameter at UNC 9/16 is approx. 14.29 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 9/16 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 21,43 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,659 '' - 0,694 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 1,135 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 1,219 '' |

### Content

- 1 x B3112: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNC 9/16 x 12 EG
- 1 x EBW14: BaerCoil Installation tool UNC 9/16 x 12
- 10 x B8212-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNC 9/16 x 12 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: "free running" - Material: A2 (1.4301)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

## BAER HSSG Hand Tap Set (3pcs.) UNC No. 10 x 24

* * *

The hand tap set consists of three taps and allows you to cut a finished thread with significantly reduced risk of breakage. The advantage of three-piece hand taps is that the respective parts of a set share the cutting power: The taper tap (No. 1) (marked with one ring) removes 65 per cent of the thread profile and the intermediate tap (No. 2) (marked with two rings) removes 85 per cent. Pre-cutting and reworking with the intermediate tap (No. 2) bring the thread into shape. In the last step, the finishing tap (No. 3) is used, which has no ring marking. Only this cuts the full and usable thread at the end. The division of labour between the three screw tap makes it easier to cut a straight and clean thread by hand.

Compared to the machine tap, the hand tap has a short shank. This allows you to cut internal thread by hand without jamming and can be operated with tap wrenches, tool ratchets or other holding tools with square drive.

The thread can be cut in a pre-drilled core hole.

Due to the short chamfer of the finish tap, the hand tap set can be used reliably and universally for through holes and blind holes.

As a rule, three-piece hand taps- sets are used for regular threads with coarse pitch, as the thread profile area is larger than for fine threads and the force effects on the taps are greater.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 10 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,19 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 4,826 |
| Pitch | 24 |
| Pitch in mm | 1,058 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 10 x 24 |
| Square | 4,9 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Screw taps |
| Product type | Hand tap sets |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Tolerance | 2B |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 352 |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | up to 900 N/mm² \| 27.1 HRC |
| Material | HSSG bright |

![Schematic representation of  Core hole diameter](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/86/b7/23/kernloch.svg)

**Core hole diameter**

3.9 mm

![Schematic representation of Bild Lochtyp](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/19/52/9d/durchgangsloch_und_sackloch.svg)

**Hole type**

Through hole and blind hole up to 2 x D

![Schematic representation of Bild Form](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/3f/1d/45/gewindebohrer_gerade_nuten.svg)

**Form / Geometry**

Form C straight fluted

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/59/5d/26/gewindebohrer_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

2-3 threads

![Schematic representation of Bild Spanabfuhr](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/bd/e2/8a/spanfluss_gerade_nuten.svg)

**Chip removal**

Rarely occurs. Chips remain in flutes.

![Schematic representation of Bild Kühlung](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/41/a7/9a/gewindebohrer_aussenkuehlung.svg)

**Cooling**

External cooling and lubrication

![Schematic representation of Bild Material](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c8/8d/2f/gewindebohrer_blank.svg)

**Material**

HSSG bright

![Schematic representation of Bild Zugfestigkeit](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/c0/4a/39/zugfestigkeit.svg)

**Tensile strength at room temperature**

up to 900 N/mm² \| 27.1 HRC

![Schematic representation of Tolerance: 2B](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/a5/fd/29/toleranz.svg)

**Tolerance**

2B

### Applications

- Materials with good machinability up to 900 N/mm²
- Unalloyed and low-alloy steels

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

Product information

## BAER HSSG Hand Tap Set (3pcs.) UNC No. 3 x 48

* * *

The hand tap set consists of three taps and allows you to cut a finished thread with significantly reduced risk of breakage. The advantage of three-piece hand taps is that the respective parts of a set share the cutting power: The taper tap (No. 1) (marked with one ring) removes 65 per cent of the thread profile and the intermediate tap (No. 2) (marked with two rings) removes 85 per cent. Pre-cutting and reworking with the intermediate tap (No. 2) bring the thread into shape. In the last step, the finishing tap (No. 3) is used, which has no ring marking. Only this cuts the full and usable thread at the end. The division of labour between the three screw tap makes it easier to cut a straight and clean thread by hand.

Compared to the machine tap, the hand tap has a short shank. This allows you to cut internal thread by hand without jamming and can be operated with tap wrenches, tool ratchets or other holding tools with square drive.

The thread can be cut in a pre-drilled core hole.

Due to the short chamfer of the finish tap, the hand tap set can be used reliably and universally for through holes and blind holes.

As a rule, three-piece hand taps- sets are used for regular threads with coarse pitch, as the thread profile area is larger than for fine threads and the force effects on the taps are greater.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 3 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,099 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 2,515 |
| Pitch | 48 |
| Pitch in mm | 0,529 |
| Dimension | UNC No. 3 x 48 |
| Square | 2,1 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Screw taps |
| Product type | Hand tap sets |
| Thread standard | UNC: American Unified National Coarse thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Tolerance | 2B |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | DIN 352 |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | up to 900 N/mm² \| 27.1 HRC |
| Material | HSSG bright |

2.1 mm

![Schematic representation of Bild Lochtyp](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/19/52/9d/durchgangsloch_und_sackloch.svg)

**Hole type**

Through hole and blind hole up to 2 x D

![Schematic representation of Bild Form](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/3f/1d/45/gewindebohrer_gerade_nuten.svg)

Form C straight fluted

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/59/5d/26/gewindebohrer_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

2-3 threads

![Schematic representation of Bild Spanabfuhr](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/bd/e2/8a/spanfluss_gerade_nuten.svg)

Rarely occurs. Chips remain in flutes.

**Tolerance**

2B

### Applications

- Materials with good machinability up to 900 N/mm²
- Unalloyed and low-alloy steels

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## BAER HSSG Hand Tap Set (3pcs.) UNC No. 3 x 48

* * *

The hand tap set consists of three taps and allows you to cut a finished thread with significantly reduced risk of breakage. The advantage of three-piece hand taps is that the respective parts of a set share the cutting power: The taper tap (No. 1) (marked with one ring) removes 65 per cent of the thread profile and the intermediate tap (No. 2) (marked with two rings) removes 85 per cent. Compared to the machine tap, the hand tap has a short shank. This allows you to cut internal thread by hand without jamming and can be operated with tap wrenches, tool ratchets or other holding tools with square drive.

The thread can be cut in a pre-drilled core hole.

Due to the short chamfer of the finish tap, the hand tap set can be used reliably and universally for through holes and blind holes.

As a rule, three-piece hand taps- sets are used for regular threads with coarse pitch, as the thread profile area is larger than for fine threads and the force effects on the taps are greater.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing hand tap with reinforced shank](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/f2/fe/8a/Technische_Zeichnung_Handgewindebohrer_Verstaerkter_SchaftsIysTBjPPgKZ1.svg)

| D1 | UNC Nr. 3 x 48 |
| D2 | 2,8 mm |
| L1 | 36 mm |
| L2 | 11 mm |
| Diameter | No. 3 |
| Square | 2,1 mm |

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

UNEF 1/4 x 32 BaerCoil Kit


**€347.89** ~~~~

## Description

Complete BaerCoil Thread-Repair-Kit

Contents:

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Standard Drill

1 x HSSG BaerCoil Tap

1 x BaerCoil Inserting Tool

1 x BaerCoil Tang Break Tool

\+ 10 BaerCoil Wire-Thread-Inserts "free running", stainless steel (ASIS 304), length: 1,5 x D

[BaerCoil instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

[Drill Sizes](http://www.baercoil.com/en/drill_sizes.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear

strenght eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread

normally is stronger than the original one.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

UNF 1/2 x 20 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNF 1/2 x 20

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in UNF 1/2 x 20.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1/2 |
| Pitch | 20 |
| Dimension | UNF 1/2 x 20 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 19,05 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 12.7 mm=19.05 mm<br>The nominal diameter for UNF 1/2 is approx. 12.7 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNF: American Fine Unified National thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1/2 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 19,05 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,559 '' - 0,617 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,925 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,975 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 161130: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 13.00 mm
- 1 x B3159: BaerCoil HSSG Single flute tap UNF 1/2 x 20 EG
- 1 x EBW12: BaerCoil Installation tool UNF 1/2 x 20
- 1 x BZ012: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNF 1/2 x 20
- 10 x B8229-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNF 1/2 x 20 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: free-running - Material: A2 (1.4301)

Product information

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNF 1/2 x 20

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in UNF 1/2 x 20.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNF 1/4 x 28

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in UNF 1/4 x 28.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Pitch | 28 |
| Dimension | UNF 1/4 x 28 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 9,53 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 6.35 mm=9.53 mm<br>The nominal diameter for UNF 1/4 is approx. 6.35 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNF: American Fine Unified National thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 9,53 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,292 '' - 0,326 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,500 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,536 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16166: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 6.60 mm
- 1 x B3155: BaerCoil HSSG Single flute tap UNF 1/4 x 28 EG
- 1 x EBW06: BaerCoil Installation tool UNF 1/4 x 28
- 1 x BZ006: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNF 1/4 x 28
- 20 x B8225-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNF 1/4 x 28 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: free-running - Material: A2 (1.4301)

BAERCOIL


## UNF 1/4 x 28 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)

From **€65.59** ~~~~

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNF 1/4 x 28

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in UNF 1/4 x 28.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Pitch | 28 |
| Dimension | UNF 1/4 x 28 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 9,53 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 6.35 mm=9.53 mm<br>The nominal diameter for UNF 1/4 is approx. 6.35 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNF: American Fine Unified National thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 9,53 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,292 '' - 0,326 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,500 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,536 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16166: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 6.60 mm
- 1 x B3155: BaerCoil HSSG Single flute tap UNF 1/4 x 28 EG
- 1 x EBW06: BaerCoil Installation tool UNF 1/4 x 28
- 1 x BZ006: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNF 1/4 x 28
- 20 x B8225-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNF 1/4 x 28 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: free-running - Material: A2 (1.4301)

Style

- UNF 1/4 x 28 BaerCoil Kit (Helicoil Type)
- TRS 1/4 X 28 UNF KIT

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNF 1'' 12

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind hole threads in UNF 1" x 12.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair set contains various auxiliary tools, such as the hand tap with oversize for insert threads, insertion tool and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

This set does not include twist drill bit and tang breaker. To drill the core hole, a 26 mm twist drill bit is still needed here. The tenon can be broken with the installation tool. To do this, pull back the installation tool after installation and turn it 90° so that it rests on the tenon. Then strike the tool briefly at the back.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1" |
| Pitch | 12 |
| Dimension | UNF 1" x 12 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 38,1 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 25.4 mm=38.1 mm<br>The nominal diameter for UNF 1" is approx. 25.4 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNF: American Fine Unified National thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1" |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 38,1 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 1,097 '' - 1,199 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 1,792 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 1,875 '' |

### Content

- 1 x B3164: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNF 1'' x 12 EG
- 1 x EBW24: BaerCoil Installation tool UNF 1'' x 12
- 5 x B8237-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNF 1" x 12 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: free-running - Material: A2 (1.4301)

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNF 1'' 12

With the inserts you avoid scrap in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair set contains various auxiliary tools, such as the hand tap with oversize for insert threads, insertion tool and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

This set does not include twist drill bit and tang breaker. To drill the core hole, a 26 mm twist drill bit is still needed here. The tenon can be broken with the installation tool. To do this, pull back the installation tool after installation and turn it 90° so that it rests on the tenon. Then strike the tool briefly at the back.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1" |
| Pitch | 12 |
| Dimension | UNF 1" x 12 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 38,1 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 25.4 mm=38.1 mm<br>The nominal diameter for UNF 1" is approx. 25.4 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNF: American Fine Unified National thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1" |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 38,1 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 1,097 '' - 1,199 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 1,792 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 1,875 '' |

### Content

- 1 x B3164: BaerCoil HSSG single-cut tap UNF 1'' x 12 EG
- 1 x EBW24: BaerCoil Installation tool UNF 1'' x 12
- 5 x B8237-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNF 1" x 12 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: free-running - Material: A2 (1.4301)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

## BaerCoil Thread Repair Kit UNF 10 x 32

* * *

With this BaerCoil® thread repair set it is possible to repair through hole threads and blind-hole threads in UNF No. 10 x 32.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your thread repair needs! With them you are able to make durable and strong connections. With the inserts you avoid waste in your components and can recycle them. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping out.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads without changing the nominal diameter. For the thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut for the wire thread insert. This thread is often also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert). Then the BaerCoil® thread insert is screwed into the old thread and thus the workpieces are screwed back together. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed evenly over the individual thread turns. In addition, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for possible pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to save carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. They are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

For repair directly on the thread, this thread repair kit contains various auxiliary tools, such as the core drill bit, hand tap with oversize for insert thread, insertion tool, tang breaker and wire thread inserts made of stainless steel.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, if necessary, according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 10 |
| Pitch | 32 |
| Dimension | UNF No. 10 x 32 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 7,24 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 4.83 mm=7.24 mm<br>The nominal diameter for UNF No. 10 is approx. 4.83 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Repair kits |
| Product type | BaerCoil thread repair kits |
| Thread standard | UNF: American Fine Unified National thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing BaerCoil thread insert](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | No. 10 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 7,24 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,227 '' - 0,256 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,394 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,426 '' |

### Content

- 1 x 16151: BaerCoil HSS twist drill bit 5.10 mm
- 1 x B3154: BaerCoil HSSG Single flute tap UNF 10 x 32 EG
- 1 x EBW05: BaerCoil Installation tool UNF 10 x 32
- 1 x BZ005: BaerCoil Tang breaker UNF 10 x 32
- 20 x B8293-15: BaerCoil thread inserts UNF No. 10 x 32 - Length: 1.5 D - Type: free-running - Material: A2 (1.4301)
